author: Staff Reporter

text:
CULTURE

GENERAL

10.30 a.m.

Rotary Club of Coimbatore: GD Naidu Memorial inter-collegiate quiz competition, G.D. Auditorium, 1.30 p.m.

Rotary Club of Saicity: Award distribution ceremony, GKNM Auditorium, 6.30 p.m.

Dr. N.G.P. College of Arts and Science: Release of journal,Tamilosai, 10.30 a.m.

Avinashilingam University: Sports day, 2 p.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Multispecialty Hospital: Gift organ give life, SNR Sons College, 8 a.m.

Kovai Medical Centre Research and Educational Trust: Dr. N.G.P. IT Project Expo – 2016,9.30 a.m.

Hindusthan Institute of Technology: Conference, 10 a.m.

SNS College of Engineering: Bridge design workshop, 10 a.m.

KTVR Knowledge Park for Engineering and Technology: Talent Hunt ’16, 10 a.m.

United Trade Fairs India (P) Ltd.: United Agirtech 2016,

10.30 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Engineering and Technology: Workshop, 9 a.m.

Rathinam Technical Campus: Graduation day, 10.30 a.m.

Kongunadu Arts and Science College: Conference, 10 a.m.

Kumaraguru College of Technology: KCT Founders Day, 10 a.m.

title: COIMBATORE TODAY
